name: CheverlyBaptistChurch
0:
”Alexa, open cheverly baptist”
”Alexa, ask cheverly baptist for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start cheverly baptist”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheverly baptist
des: Listen to the latest sermons from Cheverly Baptist Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can also say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order of the recent sermons or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
